headline: Axon Enterprise (AXON): Revisiting Valuation After Prepared Acquisition and Strong Public-Safety Growth Narrative
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) has been back in the spotlight after strong revenue growth, upbeat fund commentary, and its acquisition of Prepared, an AI platform for 911 centers, while management reaffirmed guidance. See our latest analysis for Axon Enterprise. Despite the buzz around Prepared and steady execution, Axon’s share price return has cooled recently, with a weaker 3 month move contrasting sharply with its standout 3 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has paused rather...

headline: What Makes Axon Enterprise (AXON) a Strong Investment?
summary: Sands Capital, an investment management company, released its “Sands Capital Global Growth Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Global Growth adopts a flexible approach to identify the most promising growth companies worldwide. Global equities surged in the quarter, although leadership remains concentrated.
